column2: "osiandɛ minyim hom mbɔdzembɔ a medze hyehyɛ moho kyerɛ Masidoniafo
column3: dɛ Akaia siesiee hɔnho afrenhyia nye yi
column4: na hom mbɔdzembɔ yi ekenyan hɔn mu piinara."

column3: ama hɛn ahohyehyɛ a ɔwɔ hom ho aannyɛ kwa wɔ iyi afamu

column2: "na bi a Masidoniafo bi nye hɛn bɛba
column3: na sɛ wɔbɔto hom dɛ hom nnsiesiee homho a
column5: hɛn enyi aannto wɔ dɛm ahohyehyɛ yi mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi modween dɛ ohia dɛ meserɛ enuanom no dɛ wondzi kan wɔ hom nkyɛn mbɔboaboa hom akyɛdze a wɔabɔ hom nkaa esie no ano ngu hɔ
column3: na ɔaada hɔ dɛ akyɛdze na nnyɛ epoobɔdze."
Nyia odua no kyenkyen mu no
column5: na nyia odua no bafuu no obobu no bafuu."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ obiara esusu wɔ n'akoma mu
column4: anaa nhyɛ do no ɔmma; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn dɔ nyia ɔtsew n'enyim dze ma."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn botum dɛ ɔma adom nyina bor do ma hom na adze nyina mu nye daa nyina hom eenya dza ɔdɔɔ so nyina
column3: ama hom aabor do wɔ edwuma pa nyina mu:"

column4: ɔdze ma ehiafo; Ne tsenenee tsim hɔ daa."

column3: na ɔma paanoo dɛ edziban no
column4: ɔbɛma hom aba a hom dua no adɔɔ so
column5: na ɔama hom tsenenee eduaba adɔr;"

column2: "na hom eenya hom ho wɔ ayamuyie nyina mu
column3: dza ɔnam hɛn do yɛ ndaase ho edwuma ma Nyankopɔn no."
nnyɛ dɛ wɔdze kɛhyɛ ahotseweefo no sintɔ ma nko
column4: na ɔnam ndaase pii do bu do so ma Nyankopɔn;"

column2: "na ɔnam ɔsom yi no nsɔhwɛ do wɔhyɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam wɔ setsie a hom ka dɛ hom wɔ ma Kraest asɛmpa no
column3: na ayamuyie ntoboa a hom yi boa hɔn nye nyimpa nyina ntsi;"

column2: "na hɔn so woyi mpaa ma hom na wɔfe hom wɔ Nyankopɔn adom a ɔbor do wɔ hom do ntsi."
"Ndaase nka Nyankopɔn wɔ n'akyɛdze a yenntum nnsusu no ntsi."
